snippet: Conservative media outlets are pushing Mitt Romney to erase doubts about his agenda by choosing Representative Paul D. Ryan as his running mate.
abstract: Conservatives are pushing Mitt Romney to erase doubts about his agenda by choosing Rep Paul D Ryan as his running mate; Ryan, a champion of cutting government spending and reining in the costs of entitlement programs, would do much to reassure the conservative base that Romney stands behind their fiscal agenda.

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and TRIP GABRIEL
byline.contributor: Michael D. Shear reported from Washington, and Trip Gabriel from New York.

lead_paragraph: Conservative media outlets are pushing Mitt Romney to erase doubts about his agenda by choosing Representative Paul D. Ryan as his running mate.

headline.seo: Conservatives Press Romney to Pick Paul Ryan as Running Mate
headline.main: Romney Faces Pressure From Right to Put Ryan on Ticket
headline.print_headline: A Conservative Bid for Ryan to Be Romney’s Running Mate
